entities.name: malfoy
entities.description: Malfoy is described as having a pale face and splitting into a malevolent grin. He is also mentioned to be looking up at the crumbling house behind Ron.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is described as being addressed by Malfoy with the question 'What are you doing, Weasley?' and later having his robes seized by Harry.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is described as seizing the back of Ron's robes to stop him from leaping on Malfoy and then creeping silently around behind Malfoy, Crabbe, and Goyle.

entities.name: crabbe
entities.description: Crabbe is mentioned as being present with Malfoy and Goyle.

entities.name: goyle
entities.description: Goyle is mentioned as being present with Malfoy and Crabbe.

entities.name: hagrid
entities.description: Hagrid is mentioned by Malfoy as the subject of their discussion with Ron.

entities.name: committee for the disposal of dangerous creatures
entities.description: The Committee for the Disposal of Dangerous Creatures is mentioned as being involved in a discussion with Hagrid.

relationships.description: Harry stops Ron from leaping on Malfoy.

relationships.entity_2: committee for the disposal of dangerous creatures
relationships.description: Malfoy discusses Hagrid's situation with the Committee for the Disposal of Dangerous Creatures.
